mapper.select: SELECT STORE_CODE AS storeCode ,STORE_NAME AS storeName ,STORE_WEIGHT AS storeWeight ,STORE_WEIGHT_COUNT AS storeWeightCount ,STORE_DELIVERY_YN AS storeDeliveryYN ,STORE_NATION AS storeNation ,STORE_KIND1 AS storeKind1 ,STORE_KIND2 AS storeKind2 ,STORE_KIND3 AS storeKind3 ,STORE_PAYCO_YN AS storePaycoYN ,REG_DTTM AS regDttm FROM STORE WHERE STORE_CODE=#{storeCode}

SELECT STORE_CODE AS storeCode ,STORE_NAME AS storeName ,STORE_WEIGHT AS storeWeight ,STORE_WEIGHT_COUNT AS storeWeightCount ,STORE_DELIVERY_YN AS storeDeliveryYN ,STORE_NATION AS storeNation ,STORE_KIND1 AS storeKind1 ,STORE_KIND2 AS storeKind2 ,STORE_KIND3 AS storeKind3 ,STORE_PAYCO_YN AS storePaycoYN ,REG_DTTM AS regDttm FROM STORE WHERE STORE_NAME=#{storeName}

SELECT STORE_CODE AS storeCode ,STORE_NAME AS storeName ,STORE_WEIGHT AS storeWeight ,STORE_WEIGHT_COUNT AS storeWeightCount ,STORE_DELIVERY_YN AS storeDeliveryYN ,STORE_NATION AS storeNation ,STORE_KIND1 AS storeKind1 ,STORE_KIND2 AS storeKind2 ,STORE_KIND3 AS storeKind3 ,STORE_PAYCO_YN AS storePaycoYN ,STORE_COMMENT AS storeComment ,STORE_NAVER AS storeNaver ,REG_DTTM AS regDttm FROM STORE WHERE 1=1
AND STORE_CODE NOT IN ( SELECT STORE_CODE FROM VISIT_LOG WHERE VISIT_TEAM = #{roomName} AND REG_DTTM BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), interval -7 day) AND NOW() )
AND 1 = ( CASE WHEN STORE_NATION IN #{item} THEN 1 WHEN STORE_KIND1 IN #{item} THEN 1 WHEN STORE_KIND2 IN #{item} THEN 1 WHEN STORE_KIND3 IN #{item} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )

SELECT STORE_CODE AS storeCode ,STORE_NAME AS storeName ,STORE_WEIGHT AS storeWeight ,STORE_WEIGHT_COUNT AS storeWeightCount ,STORE_DELIVERY_YN AS storeDeliveryYN ,STORE_KIND AS storeKind ,STORE_PAYCO_YN AS storePaycoYN ,STORE_COMMENT AS storeComment ,STORE_NAVER AS storeNaver ,REG_DTTM AS regDttm FROM STORE WHERE STORE_CODE NOT IN ( SELECT STORE_CODE FROM VISIT_LOG WHERE VISIT_TEAM = #{roomName} AND REG_DTTM BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), interval -7 day) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), interval -1 day) )
